proxy

Interface IServerProxy

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AServerProxy, LiveServerProxy, StubServerProxy

    public interface IServerProxy
    An interface for a Server Proxy

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • loginUser

        java.lang.String loginUser(java.lang.String username,
                         java.lang.String password)
        Logs an existing user into the game server
        Parameters:
        username: - username for registered user
        password: - password for registered user associated with specified username
        Returns:
        string: see post condition for possible values
        Precondition:
        None
        Postcondition:
        if the passed in (username, password) pair is valid: 1) returns a string of 'OK' else: 1) returns a string starting with 'BAD' followed by an error message to be displayed to the user

      • registerUser

        java.lang.String registerUser(java.lang.String username,
                            java.lang.String password)
        This call performs the following 2 actions: 1)Creates a new user account 2) Logs the new user into the game server
        Parameters:
        username: - the username the player wishes to use when logging into the game
        password: - the password the player wishes to use for logging in with the specified username
        Returns:
        string: see post for possible values
        Precondition:
        None
        Postcondition:
        if there is no existing user with the specified name: 1) returns a string of 'OK' if there is an existing user with the specified name: 2) returns a string starting with 'BAD' followed by an error message to be displayed to the user

      • listGames

        java.lang.String listGames()
        This call returns information about all of the current games
        Returns:
        string: see post for possible values
        Precondition:
        None
        Postcondition:
        1) returns a String starting with 'OK' followed by a string representation of a JSON object of the following format

        [ { "title": "Game Name", "id": 0, "players": [ { "color": orange, "name" : "playerName", "id": 0 },... ] },... ]

        where ids are integers and color is one of the following 9 values: red, green, blue, yellow, puce, brown, white, purple, orange

      • createGame

        java.lang.String createGame(java.lang.String name)
        Creates an empty game on the server
        Parameters:
        name: - the name which the created game will have
        Returns:
        string: see post for possible values
        Precondition:
        None
        Postcondition:
        1) returns a String starting with 'OK' followed by string representation of a JSON object of the following format

        { "title": "Game Name", "id": 0, "players": [ {}, {}, {}, {} ] }

      • joinGame

        void joinGame(java.lang.String color,
            int gameID)
        Adds a player to the game and sets their game cookie
        Parameters:
        color: - the available color the player wishes to use
        gameID: - the ID for the game which the player wishes to join
        Precondition:
        • Player has a valid catan.user cookie set
        • Player is already part of game or there is space for the player to join game
        • The color submitted is a valid color (red, green, blue, yellow, puce, brown, white, purple, orange) and is available in the game
        Postcondition:
        • The player is now listed as a player for game associated with gameID and has the specified color

      • getGameModel

        java.lang.String getGameModel()
        Fetches the JSON for the model of the current game.
        Returns:
        string: see post for possible values
        Precondition:
        1) Requester has a valid catan.user and catan.game id set in cookie
        Postcondition:
        if the server catan mode is the same as the client model 1) returns a string of 'true' else 1) returns a String starting with 'OK' followed by string representation of JSON format of game model

      • resetGame

        java.lang.String resetGame()
        Resets the game to how it was after all the players joined
        Returns:
        string: see post for possible values
        Precondition:
        1) Requester has a valid catan.user and catan.game id set in cookie
        Postcondition:
        1) Returns String starting with 'OK' followed by string representation of JSON format of game model

      • getGameCommands

        java.lang.String getGameCommands()
        Gets a list of all the commands played on a game
        Returns:
        string: see post for possible values
        Precondition:
        1) Requester has a valid catan.user and catan.game id set in cookie
        Postcondition:
        2) returns a String starting with 'OK' followed by string representation JSON list of the commands that have been executed in the game

      • postGameCommands

        java.lang.String postGameCommands(java.util.List<java.lang.String> commands)
        Applies a list of commands to the current game.
        Parameters:
        commands: - list of valid game commands ordered chronologically from earliest to most recent
        Returns:
        string: see post for possible values
        Precondition:
        1) Requester has a valid catan.user and catan.game id set in cookie
        Postcondition:
        if the content could not be deserialized, or an error in applying the commands: 1) returns a string starting with "BAD" and followed by an error message detailing failure if the commands were successfully deserialized: 1) returns a string starting with "OK" and followed by string representing JSON format of game model

      • listAI

        java.lang.String listAI()
        Lists the available AI types that may be added to a game
        Returns:
        string: see post for possible values
        Precondition:
        None
        Postcondition:
        1) returns a String starting with 'OK' followed by a string representation of a JSON list of strings

      • addAI

        void addAI()
        Adds an AI to the game
        Precondition:
        • The player has a valid catan.user and catan.game id
        • There is space in the game for an AI player
        Postcondition:
        • The AI player is added to the next open spot in the game associated with the poster’s catan.game cookie
        • The AI player uses a color not taken by any other player in the game

      • changeLogLevel

        void changeLogLevel(java.lang.String logLevel)
        Sets the server’s logging level
        Parameters:
        logLevel: - desired logging level for server
        Precondition:
        1) The poster specifies a valid logging level. Valid values include: SEVERE, WARNING, INFO, CONFIG, FINE, FINER, FINEST
        Postcondition:
        1) The Server uses that logging level

      • sendChat

        void sendChat(java.lang.String message)
        Sends chat message to game chat log
        Parameters:
        message: - message player wishes to post to chat log
        Precondition:
        None
        Postcondition:
        1) chat log contains message

      • acceptTrade

        void acceptTrade(boolean willAccept)
        Accept another player's trade offer
        Parameters:
        willAccept: - boolean value of whether or not player accepts proposed trade
        Precondition:
        1) player has been offered a domestic trade if willAccept = true: 2) player has resources offered on his/her part in trade
        Postcondition:
        if willAccept = true: 1) player accepting and player who offered exchange resources specified in trade if willAccept = false: 1) no resources are exchanged 2) trade offer is removed

      • discardCards

        void discardCards(java.util.List<shared.definitions.ResourceType> resources,
                java.util.Map<shared.definitions.ResourceType,java.lang.Integer> resourceHand)
        Discards cards from players hand
        Parameters:
        resources: - list of valid resource types
        resourceHand: - contains map of each resource type and the associated number of cards for the type the player is dropping
        Precondition:
        • Player is in 'Discarding' state
        • Player has over 7 cards
        • Player has the cards player is choosing to discard.
        Postcondition:
        • Player client now enters 'Robbing' state
        • Player gives up specified cards

      • rollNumber

        void rollNumber(int number)
        Specifies to the server the number that was rolled by the player
        Parameters:
        number: - an integer from 2 to 12 that represents the number that was rolled.
        Precondition:
        • The client model's status is "rolling"
        • It is the turn of the player trying to roll the dice
        Postcondition:
        • An integer from 2 to 12 is returned that represents the that was rolled
        • The client model's status is now in "discarding" or "robbing" or "playing"

      • buildRoad

        void buildRoad(boolean free,
             shared.locations.EdgeLocation roadLocation)
        Builds a road of the same color as the player building the road and at the specified location on the map
        Parameters:
        free: - a boolean that specifies whether or not the road piece has been given to the player for free.
        roadLocation: - An EdgeLocation that declares where on the map the road will be built.
        Precondition:
        • It is the players turn
        • The client model status is "Playing"
        • The road location is open
        • The road location is connected to another road
        • The road location is not on water
        • The player has the necessary resources to build a road (1 wood, 1 brick)
        Postcondition:
        • You expend the resources to play the road (1 wood, 1 brick)
        • The map lists the road correctly

      • buildSettlement

        void buildSettlement(boolean free)
        Builds a settlement of the same color as the player building the road and at the specified location on the map
        Parameters:
        free: - a boolean that specifies whether or not the settlement piece has been given to the player for free.
        Precondition:
        • It is the players turn
        • The client model status is "Playing"
        • The settlement location is open
        • The settlement location is not on water
        • The settlement location is connected to one of your roads
        • The player has the necessary resources to build a settlement (1 wood, 1 brick, 1 wheat, 1 sheep)
        Postcondition:
        • The player expends the resources necessary to play the settlement (1 wood, 1 brick, 1 wheat, 1 sheep)
        • The map lists the settlement location correctly

      • buildCity

        void buildCity()
        Builds a city of the same color as the player building the road and at the specified location on the map
        Precondition:
        • It is the players turn
        • The client model status is "Playing"
        • The city location is where the player currently has a settlement
        • The player has the necessary resources to build a city (2 wheat, 3 ore)
        Postcondition:
        • The player expends the resources necessary to play the settlement (2 wheat, 3 ore)
        • The player gets a settlement back
        • The map lists the city location correctly

      • offerTrade

        void offerTrade(ResourceHand offer,
              playerIndex receiver)
        The player offers a trade of certain resources to a another player in the game in return for different resource.
        Parameters:
        offer: - ResourceHand indicating the cards to be given and received. Negative numbers mean the players is receiving cards of that resource in the trade.
        receiver: - playerIndex which specifies the recipient whom the player is trading with
        Precondition:
        • It is the players turn
        • The client model status is "Playing"
        • The player owns the designated resources that want to be traded
        Postcondition:
        • The trade is offered to the specified player and stored in the model

      • maritimeTrade

        void maritimeTrade(int ratio,
                 Resource inputResource,
                 Resource outputResource)
        The player offers a trade of certain resources to the bank at a specified ratio depending on the port the player has a settlement on.
        Parameters:
        ratio: - an integer of value 2, 3, or 4
        inputResource: - Resource - The resource the player is giving
        outputResource: - Resource - The resoure the player is receiving
        Precondition:
        • It is the players turn
        • The client model status is "Playing"
        • The player owns the designated resources that want to be traded
        Postcondition:
        • The trade is offered to the specified player and stored in the model

      • finishTurn

        void finishTurn()
        The player finishes his/her turn.
        Precondition:
        • It is the players turn
        • The client model status is "Playing"
        Postcondition:
        • It is the next players turn

      • buyDevCard

        void buyDevCard()
        The player buys a development card from the bank.
        Precondition:
        • It is the players turn
        • The client model status is "Playing"
        • The player has the necessary resources (1 ore, 1 wheat, 1 sheep)
        • There are development cards left in the deck.
        Postcondition:
        • The player has the new card
          • If it is a monument card, it goes into the old devcard hand
          • If it is any other card, it goes into the new devcard hand (unplayable this turn)

      • playYearOfPlentyCard

        void playYearOfPlentyCard(Resource resourceOne,
                        Resource resourceTwo)
        The player can play the "Year of Plenty Card" and gain any two resource from the bank if the preconditions are satisfied.
        Parameters:
        ResourceOne: - The first of the two resources that the player desires to receive from the bank
        ResourceTwo: - The second of the two resources that the player desires to receive from the bank
        Precondition:
        • The player has the year of plenty card in their "old dev card hand"
        • The player hasn't played a devlopment card this turn yet
        • It is the players turn
        • The client model status is "Playing"
        • The two resources the player specifies are in the bank
        Postcondition:
        • The player gains one each of the two resources specified

      • playRoadBuildingCard

        void playRoadBuildingCard(shared.locations.EdgeLocation spot1,
                        shared.locations.EdgeLocation spot2)
        The player can play the "Road Buidling Card" and build two new roads at no charge if the preconditions are satisfied.
        Parameters:
        spot1: - an EdgeLocation that specifies the location of the first road to be built
        spot2: - an EdgeLocation that specifies the location of the second road to be built
        Precondition:
        • The player has the road building card in their "old dev card hand"
        • The player hasn't played a devlopment card this turn yet
        • It is the players turn
        • The client model status is "Playing"
        • The first road location is connected to one of the players existing roads
        • The second road location is connected to one of the players existing roads
        • Neither location of the two new roads is on water
        • The player has to roads
        Postcondition:
        • The player uses two roads
        • The map lists the placement of the roads correctly

      • playMonopolyCard

        void playMonopolyCard(Resource resource)
        The player can play the "Monopoly Card" and he/she specified a resource and all other players must give that resource, if available, to the player playing the monopoly card.
        Parameters:
        resource: - The specified Resource that the player wants to receive
        Precondition:
        • The player has the monopoly card in their "old dev card hand"
        • The player hasn't played a devlopment card this turn yet
        • It is the players turn
        • The client model status is "Playing"
        Postcondition:
        • All other players lost the resource card type chosen
        • The player of the card gets as much of the resource as the other players have to give of that resource

      • playSoldierCard

        void playSoldierCard(HexLocation location,
                   playerIndex victimIndex)
        The player can play the "Soldier Card" and he/she now have to move the robber to a new location on the map and steal two resources from a player that has a settlement touching the robbers new location.
        Parameters:
        location: - Hexlocation that specifies the robbers new location on the map
        victomIndex: - playerIndex of whom is getting robbed
        Precondition:
        • The player has the soldier plenty card in their "old dev card hand"
        • The player hasn't played a devlopment card this turn yet
        • It is the players turn
        • The client model status is "Playing"
        • The robber must move locations so the new location passed in cannot be the robbers current location
        • The player to rob has cards
        Postcondition:
        • The robber is in the new location
        • The player to rob gives one random resource card to the player playing the soldier card

      • playMonumentCard

        void playMonumentCard()
        The player can play the "Monument Card" and he/she will gain one victory point
        Precondition:
        • The player hasn't played a devlopment card this turn yet
        • It is the players turn
        • The client model status is "Playing"
        Postcondition:
        • The player gains a victory point
